name: Project GH
description:
Intro

2d platformer where you play as a spaceship saboteur. 

Your objective is to scape before the ship explodes while a black hole chase you.

Get the yellow collectables to sum points and the blue ones to shatter asteroids. 

If you get play the game well, you can get into the scoreboard!

How to play

Aim with the cursor and hold to load hook

Try to get to the top!

Follow us on IG -> Birdy Instagram
